pronunciation: SHIB'BOLETH, [Heb. an ear of corn, or a stream of water.]

definitions.text:
1. A word which was made the criterion by which to distinguish the Ephraimites not being able to pronounce the letter sh, pronounced the word sibboleth. See Judges 12:6. Hence,
2. The criterion party; that which distinguishes one party from another; and usually some peculiarity in things little importance.
